One of the Best Games I ever played since teenage years, and I still loved it.

This was my go to game whenever I had some free time. Playing from I came home from school til I went to bed at 2 am and then doing it all over again. Thousands and thousands of hours spent in the game. And this was even before Steam came around. So yeah, while I don't have a lot of hours in the game on this account, I do on an older one that I no longer have access to.

One of the most important interactive medias to get yourself better than before in themes of thinking, hand-eye-coordination, reflexes, individuality and so on. 
It is like a million little games in one game and you can play it with enough real humans to experience for yourself.

Легендарная игра. Вспоминаешь какую-нибудь карту, как вы толпой играли на ней - и просто слезы умиления.

Пусть многие и не застали, так сказать, того времени, когда даже графика этой игры была на высшем уровне, но то, что в нее играют до сих пор - это показатель. Лишь единицы (игр) могут похвастаться этим.
Игрушка супер, жаль только стримов нету и лан турниров мало после выхода CS:GO

Un clásico donde los haya. Este juego, que nació como un simple mod de Half-Life, sentó las bases de TODOS los shooters que conocemos actualmente. ¿Por qué vale la pena jugarlo teniendo Global Offensive? Por la diversión que ofrecen los servidores dedicados. Hay una enorme cantidad de servidores con mapas creados por la comunidad, incluso algunos que cambian todas las armas y efectos sonoros. Counter Strike 1.6 sigue muy vivo hoy en día.

Игра стареет, игроки стареют.. Интерес отпадает.
Но она навсегда останется легендой для многих, да и теперь онлайн лишь в Steam составляет over 30k. А что с non-Steam?...
В сумме я наиграл в неё более 2000 часов. И, наверное, не жалею!
Счастья вам, котаны!
esse jogo vai ser o melhor sempre.

Played this game for the first time in 2008. Since then I have clocked more than 5000 hours, that's how addictive its multiplayer is. Father of all FPS in MP. Plus has several mods deathmatch, hns, kz, gungame, scrim, zombiemod and paintball. It's been 14 years and the game is still going strong atleast in the Indian scene.
I suck at it. But it's still fun.

Counter-Strike to sieciowa gra drużynowa pozwalająca na wcielenie się w członków grup terrorystycznych lub zwalczających ich żołnierzy z elitarnych oddziałów. Każda z frakcji ma dostęp do swojego arsenału broni oraz wyposażenia. Dzięki systemowi premii pieniężnych za dobrze wykonane zadania gracze mogą kupować nowy sprzęt potrzebny w czasie starć z drużyną przeciwną. Counter-Strike to sieciowa gra drużynowa, w której rozwój wydarzeń śledzi się z perspektywy pierwszej osoby. Counter-Strike jest taktyczną grą akcji, umiejętne współdziałanie poszczególnych członków drużyny może mieć kluczowe znaczenie na odniesienie sukcesu w całej rozgrywce. Counter-Strike jest grą niezwykle popularną, cieszącą się nie słabnącym zainteresowaniem. Liczne ogólnoświatowe mistrzostwa wskazują, że gra szybko się jeszcze fanom nie znudzi.

Counter-Strike так и останется для меня лучшей игрой). Если же вы хотите поиграть с друзьями или же просто отдохнуть играя в игры - эта игра вам подойдёт. Каждый день с другом веселюсь в старой, доброй контре)
Esta chido el juego, pero ojala pudieran hacerlo mas ligero ya que los fps me andan por lo suelos :c

Around 2009, I joined a server and a guy changed his nickname to 'MACALONI'. Moments later, like many others in the server did, I copied that nickname somewhat and thus I was reborn as 'MOCOLONI'. The game is the perfect mixture between being competitive and casual.

Welcome to [b]Counter-Strike[/b]. In this game, you'll find:
[list][*] Players you can be very friends with.
[*] Players you can have a great time playing with/against.
[*] Players with edgy nicknames.
[*] Players that copy other players' nicknames.
[*] Players pretending to be girls.
[*] Players with cars on their avatars.
[*] Players with butts on their avatars.
[*] Players that claim to be playing the game since "the Betas".
[*] Players with heavy lags.
[*] Players from other countries that think you speak their language.[/list]

What is there to really say about Counter-strike? I never really played cs all these years I've been on Steam. I had all the time to do it, but it never interested me. So some time goes by, and I decided. "Y'know what, I'll try out Counter-strike."
 I'm angry at myself for not trying it sooner! It has proven to be addicting. 

At first glances, a new player to cs 1.6 is a challenging experience. It's different compared to the newer ones. You will be up against many experienced veteran players who know the game by heart, you will struggle to maintain your cool at times, but once you finally learn the game, take the time and actually play it, it gets better. It's a difficult challenge, and thats what I like about it. Can run on any computer because of the specs: light-weight, low spec, Simple yet Complex. The gameplay is an adrenaline rush. An enjoyable experience all-around.

Huge learning curve.So get ready for "C'mon, how did he even shoot me?" "Where??!!" "I hate this game." "HOW??" You'll be saying that alot.   -- At the end of the day, it's 100% better than the newer counter strike titles. More skill and effort is required to play compared to the other ones in my opinion.

 I recommend that if anyone wants to play counter strike, 
I tell them, start with CS 1.6 -- It's a classic.
